testcase.name: runScenario["Successful login with valid credentials", "Sauce Demo Login Functionality"](1)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Successful login with valid credentials # src/test/resources/features/login.feature:9 Given the user is on the login page # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userIsOnLoginPage() When the user logs in with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce" # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userLogsInWithCredentials(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then the user should be logged in successfully # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userShouldBeLoggedInSuccessfully()

testcase.name: runScenario["Failed login with locked out user", "Sauce Demo Login Functionality"](2)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Failed login with locked out user # src/test/resources/features/login.feature:13 Given the user is on the login page # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userIsOnLoginPage() When the user logs in with username "locked_out_user" and password "secret_sauce" # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userLogsInWithCredentials(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then the user should see an error message containing "locked out" # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userShouldSeeErrorMessage(java.lang.String)

testcase.name: runScenario["Failed login with invalid username", "Sauce Demo Login Functionality"](3)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Failed login with invalid username # src/test/resources/features/login.feature:17 Given the user is on the login page # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userIsOnLoginPage() When the user logs in with username "invalid_user" and password "secret_sauce" # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userLogsInWithCredentials(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then the user should see an error message containing "Username and password do not match" # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userShouldSeeErrorMessage(java.lang.String)

testcase.name: runScenario["Failed login with empty credentials", "Sauce Demo Login Functionality"](5)

testcase.name: runScenario["Login with different types of users", "Sauce Demo Login Functionality"](6)
testcase.system-out: Scenario Outline: Login with different types of users # src/test/resources/features/login.feature:37 Given the user is on the login page # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userIsOnLoginPage() When the user enters username "standard_user" # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userEntersUsername(java.lang.String) And the user enters password "secret_sauce" # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userEntersPassword(java.lang.String) And the user clicks the login button # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userClicksLoginButton() Then the user should be logged in successfully # com.saucedemo.stepdefinitions.LoginSteps.userShouldBeLoggedInSuccessfully()
